name: Perfect Girlfriend
description:
Perfect Girlfriend

Ever wanted the perfect girlfriend? well now you can have her on your iPhone or iPad

She'll give you compliments when you need a compliment, she'll chat you up when you want her too and she will also responds to you touching her.

Also if you would like a personalised message from her just email info@appstyle.co.uk and she will be happy to send you it.


Follow us on twitter www.twitter.com/AppStyleUK
Like us on Facebook www.facebook.com/AppStyleUK


Voiced by VoiceoverGuy http://www.VoiceoverGuy.co.uk
